devdoc.author: Andrea Lisi, Samuel Fabrizi
devdoc.details: The Item contract inherits from Permissioned. It defines the structure of a Rating and it keeps a RatingFunction instance to let the users know how its final score will be computed

addRate(uint8,uint256).details: Check whether caller has the permission on this contract (since it's an extension of Permissioned)

params._score: The score to assign to this item
params._valueSkill: The skill value of the rater

params._to: The new owner of this contract

checkForPermission(address).details: 0: Permission granted; 1: No permission granted; 2: Permission granted but out of date

commitPermission(address,uint256).details: After checking _to is a correct User contract call the parent function

params._function: The RatingFunction to use to compute the final score

computeScore(address).return: The final score of this Item

constructor.details: The constructor calls the Permisioned constructor

params._nameToken: The name of the tokens owned by the item
params._owner: the owner's address of the Item
params._rsf: The RatingSystemFramework the Item belongs to
params._symbolToken: The symbol of the tokens owned by the item
params._tokenValue: The value of the tokens owned by the item

getAllRatings().return: _scores: the array of scores_blocks: the array of blocks_raters: the array of User addresses which rated this Item_raters: the array of skill values of raters

getPolicy(address).return: _deadline: the deadline period (block number)_granted: the flag "permission granted"

getTokenOwned().return: The number of tokens owned by function caller

getTokenOwnedValue().return: The value of tokens owned by function caller

grantPermission(address).details: After checking _to is a correct User contract call the parent function

params._to: The address meant to have permission

revokeCommitment(address).details: Only the owner of this contract or the receiver itself can revoke the permission to the receiver

revokePermission(address).details: Only the owner of this contract or the receiver itself can revoke the permission to the receiver

devdoc.title: Item

changeOwner(address).notice: This function provides the possibility to change the owner

checkForPermission(address).notice: Check the permission status of a certain address

commitPermission(address,uint256).notice: Store a permission promise only if the User pays the input amount

getAllRatings().notice: Get all the ratings information of this Item

getPolicy(address).notice: Get current permission policy of the caller

getTokenOwned().notice: Get the number of tokens owned by function caller

getTokenOwnedValue().notice: Get the value of tokens owned by function caller

grantPermission(address).notice: Grant the permission to access to this contract to only User contract belonging to the same RatingSystemFramework

isCommited(address,uint256).notice: Check if an address has commited a certain amount

ratingCount().notice: Get the number of ratings performed on this Item

revokePermission(address).notice: Revoke the permission to access to this contract to a certain address (contract or EOA)

successfulPayment(address,uint256,uint25.notice: Confirm user payment and transfer token

userdoc.notice: This contract represents an item of the RatingSystemFramework. Items can be rated by external accounts or contract only if they have the permissions to do that
